e="preserve">Mathew Knowles (born 1952) is an American record executive, talent manager, and businessman. He is best known for being the manager of Destiny's Child. He also managed his daughters Beyoncé and Solange Knowles. He is the ex-husband of Tina Knowles, and father-in-law of Jay-Z. He was born in Gadsden, Alabama.
In October 2019, Knowles announced that he is suffering from male breast cancer.
